Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Authorizes the carrying of firearms by military personnel at recruiting centers
Summary: Authorizes the carrying of service-issued firearms by military personnel at recruiting centers while on duty.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the military law, in relation to authorizing the carrying of firearms by military personnel at recruiting centers
